actions.text: By unanimous consent, the Brown (CA) amendment was withdrawn.

purpose: An amendment to provide $4.1 million in additional funding for the National Weather Service Operations and Research, Local Warnings and Forecasts (for a total of $228 million) by reducing funding for Oceanic and Atmospheric Research by the same amount. The amendment also restricts funding in the bill from being used for the Great Lakes sea lampricide eradication program or regional climate centers.
